attributes.action: Say no to huge wages for heads of charitable organisations!
attributes.additional_details: Nowadays, the majority of money generated for the large charities barely even goes to the people it was intended to be raised for. The majority is siphoned into various levels of administration within these charities... As if that wasn't sick enough, some of the heads of these organizations are earning more the Prime Minister's wage of £142,500 a year! This sort of payload for a charity is both immoral, and abhorrent, and needs to be addressed!
